articles.description: Martin Lewis has been left 'shaken' after he received a barrage of vile online abuse following a poll about the Covid-19 vaccine. The television star has been forced to block several accounts
articles.content:
Martin Lewis revealed that he was left 'shaken' after he faced a barrage of vile abuse on social media from several anti-vaxxers. 
 The 48-year-old finance guru decided to step away from Twitter las… [+2107 chars]
